name: Awaken (itch) (Floor Tentacles Devs)
description:
The WebGL version doesn't seem to work, please use the executables for Windows, Linux, and Mac.

Summary:

A game submitted for Brackeys Gamejam 2022.1 by the floor tentacles.

This is a short and simple puzzle game where you progress through your day in a dream. However, repeatedly throughout the day you fall into situations that kill you. In order to continue , you will have to figure out how to avoid and overcome these situations, by using many items you find in the game.

Controls: 

WASD and Arrow Keys to move. E to interact. ESC to open the menu. Left-Click when instructed.
